programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Ua Hala (Death in the Family). A 21st-century reimagining of the TV classic, Hawaii Five-0 launched last year and received the thumbs up from fans and critics, not to mention a Golden Globe(r) nod, thanks to scripting smarts and a generous quotient of whizz-bang- wallops. Expectations are high for this follow-up outing and, if the recent casting coups are anything to go by, it won't disappoint. )

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: La O Na Makuahine (Mother's Day). The third season begins with McGarrett dealing with the realization that his thought-to-be-deceased mother is alive. Meanwhile, Five-0 hunts for Wo Fat to avenge the death of a team family member

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Kanalua (Doubt). Five-0 must hunt down a group of thieves who rob a high-end art store in a shopping mall

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Exchange. Like a fine wine, TV's longest-running crime drama improves with age. Season 19 arrives on Sky 1 HD and, sticking to the formula that has proven so popular, it delivers topical storylines buoyed by top-notch acting

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Broken Dolls. Officer Lance's past catches up with him when a killer he put away years earlier escapes from prison. Plus, Oliver digests some difficult news

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Cheaper by the Coven. When Paige and Phoebe summon Grams for Chris's birth ceremony, she puts a spell on Wyatt and Chris to end their sibling rivalry that backfires and turns the Charmed Ones into bickering teenagers. Phoebe attends an award ceremony with Leslie, Victor returns to town, and Leo consults a seer to find out who is behind a recent demonic attack on Wyatt

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Charrrmed!. When Paige encounters Captain Black Jack Cutting, an 18th century pirate in search of the Fountain of Youth, the curse on his life becomes her problem. Meanwhile, Leslie manipulates a contest in order to spend time with Phoebe, Leo fights with the creature that caused him to kill an Elder and a mysterious federal agent comes to town to investigate the Halliwells

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Styx Feet Under. Paige (Rose McGowan) casts a spell to thwart the efforts by the demon Sirk (Zack Ward) to kill off all his blood relatives. Unfortunately Paige's spell works too well -- and as result, no one on earth is dying, not even those whose time has come. Angered that someone is crimping his style, the Angel of Death (Simon Templeman) "murders" Piper (Holly Marie Combs) to force the other Charmed Ones to undo Paige's damage. The girls agree -- not realizing that the next person scheduled to be collected by the Angel of Death is Phoebe (Alyssa Milano)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Weekend at Bobby's. Bobby tries to get Crowley to return his soul, but when Crowley refuses, Bobby takes matters into his own hands. Jensen Ackles directed the episode

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Live Free or Twi-hard. When a vampire links the disappearance of a number of girls, Sam and Dean track down the bloodsucker who sinks his teeth into one of the brothers..

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: You Can't Handle the Truth. Sam and Dean's investigation into a series of suicides reveals that someone is invoking the Goddess of Truth and forcing people to be cruelly honest. And Dean is the next victim..

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Family Matters. Demon hunting brothers, Sam and Dean Winchester, return with an all-new sixth series of the supernatural drama

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Nazi on the Honeymoon. After a disastrous wedding, surely Booth and Brennan can count on a stress-free honeymoon? Fun in the Buenos Aires sun is cut short by a murder

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Dude in the Dam. The investigation of a model's murder reveals that his main source of income was sperm donations, but the discovery that he falsified records spawns a long list of suspects. Meanwhile, Brennan gets into a feud with a fellow author; and Hodgins keeps an eye on a fly larva

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Fury in the Jury. Brennan serves as a juror on a case involving a professional soccer player who's charged with murdering his wife, but she doesn't think he's guilty until his best friend also winds up dead, and then it becomes a team effort to prove he's the killer

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Mystery in the Meat. Brennan investigates how human remains ended up in school cafeteria food. Elsewhere, Angela and the girls throw her a belated bachelorette party

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Spark in the Park. A nationally ranked gymnast is murdered and her remains are hit by lightning and strewn about a public park, and evidence suggests she was leading a double life, but Booth is more puzzled by Brennan's empathy for the victim's father. Meanwhile, Cam confronts the woman who stole her identity

programme.title: The Help
programme.desc: A 1960s-era Mississippi debutante sends her community into an uproar by conducting a series of probing interviews with the black servants behind some of her community's most prominent families. Skeeter (Emma Stone) has just graduated from college, and she's eager to launch her career as a writer. In a moment of inspiration, Skeeter decides to focus her attention on the black female servants who work in her community. Her first subject is Aibileen (Viola Davis), the devoted housekeeper who has been employed by Skeeter's best friend's family for years. By speaking with Aibileen, Skeeter becomes an object of scorn to the wealthy locals, who view her actions as directly challenging to the established social order. Before long, even more servants are coming forward to tell their stories, and Skeeter discovers that friendship can blossom under the most unlikely of circumstances. Bryce Dallas Howard co-stars in a touching tale of race relations based on author Kathryn Stockett's best-selling novel of the same name(n)

programme.desc: برنامج واقعي أمريكي يعرض عشرين مقطعاً من المقاطع الأكثر إثارة للصدمة واللحظات والحوادث الخطرة جداً والمأخوذة من الحياة الحقيقية، حيث يعرض في كل حلقة عداً تنازلياً للقصص الحافلة بالتشويق للكشف عن الفيديو الأفظع بينهم(n)

programme.title: The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day
programme.desc: عندما يعلم الشقيقان ماكمانوس أن صديقهما الكاهن الطيب قد لقي مصرعه على أيدي رجال العصابات، يقرران العودة لبوسطن وبدء القتال من جديد انتقاما له(n)

programme.title: WWE Main Event - الموسم 5
programme.desc: مجموعة من اللقطات الحصرية من عروض المصارعة الحرة الشهيرة، "الروو" و "السماكداون"، بالإضافة إلى مواجهتين من العيار الثقيل وتقارير خاصة عن مصارعين الدابليو دابليو إي(n)

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull
programme.desc: برنامج مسابقات شرس يقدمه لاعب المصارعة الشهير ستيف اوستن ويتضمن تحديات جسدية يخوضها المشتركين الذين يتم انتقائهم تبعا لمهاراتهم الرياضية. ويتم خروج المتسابقين من التحدي بالتدريج حتى يتبقى شخص واحد لمواجهة التحدي الأخير والصعب والمسمى ب "سكل بستر"(n)

programme.title: The Ricky Gervais Show
programme.desc: سلسلة رسوم متحركة كوميدية يقوم بأدائها الصوتي كل من ريكي جيرفايس، ستيفن ميرتشانت، وزميلهما وصديقهما كارل بيلكنجتون الذين تلهم أفكارهم غير العادية أكثر من جزء في القصة التي تتضمن مزايا الاختراعات في القرن العشرين(n)

programme.title: NCIS-الموسم 12
programme.desc: مجموعة من المحققين البارعين بقيادة الجندي البحري السابق والمحقق الفذ "ليروي غيب" ، يستخدمون مهاراتهم العالية في التحقيق فضلا عن حدسهم الذي لا يخيب وذلك من أجل حل أعقد القضايا الاجرامية التي تتعلق بالبحرية والملاحة في مدينة واشنطن(n)

programme.title: Platoon
programme.desc: يعاني متطوع أمريكي شاب، يتطوع في حرب فيتنام من صراع نفسي أخلاقي، ويخوض معركتين، يدخل فيها في صراع مع العدو وصراع مع رجال فصيلته

programme.title: Tears of the Sun
programme.desc: يسافر الملازم إيه كيه ووترز وفرقته إلى نيجيريا لإنقاذ طبيبة أمريكية من انقلاب عسكري، فتشترط الطبيبة أن يقوموا بمساعدة الأهالي لتوافق على الرحيل معهم

programme.title: Antwone Fisher

programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July
